verbose_text: A recent study in C. elegans also showed that ubiquitous loss of DLC1 and Dynein functions cause excessive germ cell proliferation XREF_BIBR, indicating a distinct role of these molecules in germline homeostasis.
evidence: DLC1 and Dynein functions cause excessive germ cell proliferation XREF_BIBR , indicating a distinct role of these molecules in germline homeostasis
